simsim.ext.rmi
Class UnicastRemoteObject

java.lang.Object
  simsim.ext.rmi.UnicastRemoteObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageHandler
public class UnicastRemoteObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageHandler

This is the basic class in the SimSim RMI/RPC package that has to be extended to implement a remote object/server. See the example.
